Alcohol 120% is a popular software that allows users to easily create and manage virtual drives. It's a versatile software that has gained reputation among the users because of its unique features and ease of usage. The name of the software symbolizes the ability of the software to replicate CDs and DVDs to a digital format. In this article, we will dive into the features and usage of Alcohol 120%.

## Installing Alcohol 120%

To begin using Alcohol 120%, you will need to install it on your computer. The installation process is quite straightforward and simple. You can download the software from the official website and run the setup file. Once you have accepted the terms and conditions, you can proceed with the installation process. 

## Features of Alcohol 120%

### Creating Virtual Drives

The primary feature of Alcohol 120% is the ability to create virtual drives. This feature enables users to mount and unmount virtual disks on their computer. This allows users to access the content of a disk without the need for a physical CD or DVD. 

### Replicating CDs and DVDs

Alcohol 120% allows you to create copies of your CDs and DVDs in a digital format. This is useful if you want to keep a backup of your important media files or if you need to use a digital copy of a disk on a computer that doesn't have a CD/DVD drive.

### Burning CDs and DVDs

With Alcohol 120%, users can also burn CDs and DVDs. This feature comes in handy when you need to create a physical copy of your digital files.

### Image Processing

The software also provides tools for image processing. It includes features like image creation, editing, and conversion. Alcohol 120% supports popular image formats like ISO, MDS, CCD, BIN, and more.

### Compatibility

Alcohol 120% is fully compatible with Windows operating systems. Additionally, it supports many file systems like NTFS, UDF, FAT, and others.

## Usage of Alcohol 120%

### Creating Virtual Drives

To create a virtual drive, open Alcohol 120% and click on the "Virtual Drive" option. Next, select the drive letter and the device type for the virtual drive. You can choose between CD/DVD/Blu-ray or virtual hard disk. Once you have made your selection, click on "Add".

### Mounting Virtual Drives

To mount a virtual drive, right-click on an image file that you want to mount and select "Mount to a device". This will open a dialog box where you can select the virtual drive in which you want to mount the image file. Click "OK" to mount.

### Burning CDs and DVDs

To burn CDs and DVDs, open the "Image Burning Wizard". Next, select the image file that you want to burn, the speed, and the burner device. Finally, click on "Start".

### Image Processing

To create an image file, select the "Image Creation Wizard" option. Next, select the device that you want to read the data from, the image format, and the output file. Finally, click on "Start".

## Conclusion

Alcohol 120% is a powerful software that provides users with an easy and efficient way to manage their virtual drives. With its features like creating virtual drives, replicating CDs and DVDs, and image processing, it has become a go-to choice for many users. Its compatibility with Windows operating systems also makes it a reliable software for disk management.
